Articles.Content: Add Farings Because A Lot Of People Are OCD
Please check the What not to suggest thread before making a suggestion.

They'll undoubtedly add fairings at some point. They might even adopt the procedural fairings mod in some way. Or do something very similar, perhaps their own expanded procedural fairings with various options and what-not.

They'll kind of need them whenever they get around to reworking the aerodynamics. But until then, they've got bigger fish to fry

Payload fairings are on the what not to suggest list. Fairings will probably be in the game someday, however, and there are many mods that add fairings that you can try out. In fact, fairings are even on the official planned features list.

Thread locked, have a nice day.
